Text.Name: SunnyDay
Text.StoryDesc: Clear skies and still airs throughout the land

Text.Name: Overcast
Text.StoryDesc: A thick layer of cloud covers the sky above

Text.Name: LightRain
Text.StoryDesc: A thin curtain of rain sweeps across the plains

Text.Name: HeavyRain
Text.StoryDesc: The skies have opened, drenching all below with heavy rain

Text.Name: LightSnow
Text.StoryDesc: A light snow hangs in the air and dusts the land with a shimmering gleam

Text.Name: HeavySnow
Text.StoryDesc: Heavy snowfall brings with it a biting cold and harsh winds

Text.Name: DenseFog
Text.StoryDesc: Clouds converge in the sky and a dense fog falls upon the land

Text.Name: Melancholy
Text.StoryDesc: A gloomy mood permeates the air

Text.Name: SpringAir
Text.StoryDesc: The crisp smell of spring sweeps the lands

Text.Name: HarvestAir
Text.StoryDesc: It's harvest time, and a jolly air descends

Text.Name: Ambiguous
Text.StoryDesc: Love is in the air

Text.Name: Impetuous
Text.StoryDesc: There is an impulsive atmosphere

Text.Name: MouldRains
Text.StoryDesc: Extended rains pour down upon the land

Text.Name: Drought
Text.StoryDesc: The sun scorches all below with its fiery gaze

Text.Name: Rainstorm
Text.StoryDesc: Rainstorm is wreaking havoc

Text.Name: Fohn
Text.StoryDesc: Warm, dry winds blow by

Text.Name: DustStorm
Text.StoryDesc: The sky dims as dust and sand fill the air

Text.Name: LingRarefiedWave
Text.StoryDesc: A Qi Drought arrives

Text.Name: LingUpWave
Text.StoryDesc: Qi forces rise, and abound throughout the land

Text.Name: LingUpWave_Little
Text.StoryDesc: Qi pervades the air

Text.Name: HeatWave
Text.StoryDesc: A wave of heat blazes relentlessly

Text.Name: ColdWave
Text.StoryDesc: Cold winds and icy gales descend

Text.Name: HeatWaveInWinter
Text.StoryDesc: The pale winter sun shines as a warm current arrives

Text.Name: ColdWaveInSummer
Text.StoryDesc: A refreshing summer breeze blows

Text.Name: PermanentNight
Text.StoryDesc: It is a neverending night

Text.Name: Miasma
Text.StoryDesc: A noxious atmosphere spreads

Text.Name: LightningStorm
Text.StoryDesc: Booming thunder rolls through the land as lightning dances between the clouds

Text.Name: LightningStormNoLong
Text.StoryDesc: Booming thunder rolls through the land as lightning dances between the clouds

Text.Name: FohnNoFeng
Text.StoryDesc: Warm, dry winds blow by

Text.Name: Rainstorm_Long
Text.StoryDesc: Rainstorm is wreaking havoc

Text.Name: LuShu_SunnyDay
Text.StoryDesc: Clear skies and still airs throughout the land

Text.Name: Fei_HeavyRain
Text.StoryDesc: The skies have opened, drenching all below with heavy rain

Text.Name: Fei_Overcast
Text.StoryDesc: A thick layer of cloud covers the sky above

Text.Name: MuYu_LightRain
Text.StoryDesc: A thin curtain of rain sweeps across the plains

Text.Name: SpringFestival
Text.StoryDesc: A celebratory atmosphere fills the air as Spring Festival arrives

Text.Name: ZuShiBiHu
Text.StoryDesc: Theres is air of Cultivation
